name: closefriend
text: A comment left by closefriend was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by randombeing, keithcozz, Mustakrakesh)

name: malesherbez
text: I thought he was just kind of reacting to the horror unfolding around him

name: bookofsand
text: Eh, a little bit of both.

name: cicadalek
text: Reminds me of Phillipe's pose in the 'Skeleton in the closet' strip

name: baryonyx
text:
"Hey Phillipe, guess what's going on at the Acres!"
"I dunno. Aches stuff?"
"A fight! "
"...! AAAAH! AAAAAAAH! AAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!"

name: senseihollywood
text:
"well I'm gonna save em the walk"
how badass is that?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: action-movie line, fo'sho.

name: carlyle
text: Not a real life one, though.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: The GOF produced perhaps some of the best one-liners in Achewood history.

name: hellaedgar
text: Roast Beef's goggles on the ground just make it.

name: i_love_kate
text:
...

...thought that was a sandal...

name: cpnglxynchos
text: a scandal!

name: baryonyx
text:
So that's what that is.

I was thinking, "Roast Beef doesn't wear shoes..."

name: patkun
text: first panel is genius. Show me a more conventional comic artisrt who could give you even half that atmosphere.

name: dissembly
text: You can hear the caterwauling, drifting over the Acres.

name: jar
text: Ray is about to Get Things Done.

name: afkpuz
text: How anyone's aviator frames aren't bent by day 3 confounds me.

name: javonathan
text: Ray tells his colleagues to keep up the good work. Ray is not happy with them.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: NOOOOOOOOOO

name: baryonyx
text:
"Well, I'm gonna save 'em the walk. You dopes stay here and keep up the great work."

Now that is a fine Leave right there.

name: wulvaine
text: If you mess with Ray's dogg, you WILL get torn apart.

name: charchar
text: Dis Ray's dogg, you fluff Ray's hog.

name: benhendry
text: Dude with a limp?  Anyone remember the guy Roast Beef ran over with the motorcycle?

name: senseihollywood
text:
good catch...

but I think he just threw that in as the sort of thing that seasoned liars know make a good lie into a great lie:

plausible detail...

name: hateandwar
text: They probably didn't let that dude fight, I mean Beef damn snapped that dude's leg. Even in the celebration of manliness that is the Great Outdoor Fight I don't think anybody would call you chicken for not fighting after having one of your legs cracked by a damn motorcycle.

name: diggydow
text: Please listen to Queens of the Stone Age's "Song for the Dead" as you click "next>>"

name: anzio
text: Or any ol' time of the day, really.

name: direhaggis
text: Cody Travis' boys don't seem like the type to take the rules of engagement too seriously. I would half-expect the bastards to be waiting out near the tent somewhere in ambush.

name: allanpinkerton
text: Christian Brothers is the best possible name for a brandy.

name: selbencoirlo
text: Okay but it is not a made up brandy. I have gotten proper drunk off of it myself.

name: c_b
text: it's just the booze talkin'.

name: coreythegreat
text: I love how he mentions that one of the 50 dudes has a limp. So Ray knows exactly which group of 50 dudes to get completely merciless on!

name: jamb23
text: For Ray, it is of low class to thank a bottle of whiskey and a flavourless turkey out loud. A thumbs-up will suffice.

name: axtrx
text: Like in Lie Bot's bedtime story, the alt text pointed out a joke that completely passed me by when I first read the strip
